name: yt2prompt
description: Chrome extension to transform YouTube transcripts into AI-ready prompts

scripts.build: parcel build src/contentScript.js src/llmContentScript.js src/popup.js manifest.json popup.html icon.webp --dist-dir dist --public-url .
scripts.watch: parcel watch src/contentScript.js src/popup.js prompts.json manifest.json popup.html icon.webp --dist-dir dist
